title: how to learn flask
content: To learn Flask, start with basics: install Flask, create routes for web pages, and understand templates. Build small projects, like a simple blog or to-do list, to practice. Learn about database integration and user authentication. Follow tutorials, read documentation, and join forums for help. Experiment, make mistakes, and understand how things work. Gradually, tackle more advanced topics, like RESTful APIs. Practice regularly, and you'll gain confidence in web development with Flask.
author: rana dhruv
